Chat
Turn on notifications so you know right away when he messages you.
Following
In order to %s, you need to allow Moment to access your microphone.
You need to allow Moment to access your microphone.\nMethod: Setting> Application >Moment >Permission >Microphone
In order to visit photo gallery or take photos, you need to allow Moment to access your camera and storage permission
You need to allow Moment to access your photo gallery and camera before sending pics. Method: Setting> Application >Moment >Permission >Storage & Camera
In order to use %sÔºåyou need to allow Moment to access your camera and microphone permission.
You need to allow Moment to access your microphone and camera. Method: Setting> Application >Moment >Permission >Microphone & Camera
In order to %s, you need to allow Moment to access your storage permission.
You need to allow Moment to access your storage permission,Method: Setting> Application >Moment >Permission >Storage & Camera
Hey, someone nearby is waiting to meet you! Remember to click [Chat] when you see him/her. This function is available when üìçGPS is on.
You need to allow Moment to access your location before using Hey There. Method: Setting> Application >Moment >Permission >Location access
In order to share your location,you need to allow Moment to access your location permission.
You need to allow Moment to access your location permission, Method: Setting>Application >Moment>Permission>Location
